DOC.brief_summary: This study Phase 2 , open-label study ass pharmacokinetics ( PK ) safety AA4500 0.58 mg men Peyronie 's disease . Subjects screen study eligibility within 21 day initial injection study drug . Two injection administer 24 hour apart . Subjects admit study unit day first injection AA4500 ( Day -1 ) remain study unit PK sample collect investigator penile plaque model Day 3 . Subjects return study unit Day 4 , Day 8 , Day 29 follow-up pharmacokinetic safety assessments.Pharmacokinetic plasma sample collect predetermine time point ( 15 minute pre-injection ) injection Day 1 Day 2 ( 5,10 , 20 , 30 minute 1,2,3,4,8,12 hour ) , Days 3 , 4 , 8 , 29.Plasma level AUX-I ( clostridial type I collagenase ) AUX-II ( clostridial type II collagenase ) determine .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics Single Treatment Cycle AA4500 0.58 mg Men With Peyronie 's Disease
